tool_description: Find out a person's email address
name: MetaAPI EmailFinder
title: MetaAPI EmailFinder

api_list.name: findEmail
api_list.description:
Find out a person's email address by using their name and company domain.

Supports 500+ name variants (Eg. Robert, Rob, Bob, ...)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://metaapi-emailfinder.p.rapidapi.com/v1/email/cnn.com/Jane Smith"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "metaapi-emailfinder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://metaapi-emailfinder.p.rapidapi.com/v1/email/{domain}/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "metaapi-emailfinder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
